full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I SMON LAM BSKAL BZANG 'JUG NGOGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I SMON LAM SKAL BZANG 'JUG NGOGS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SDOM BRTZON CHOS LA 'DUN PA GU SHRI NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'PHEL GYIS YANG YANG NAN TAN DU BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS CHOS SMRA BA, BLO BZANG CHOS KYI NYI MAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS KYIS BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I NYAMS LEN 'PHEL ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DZA YANTU, ,)
